name: MKMapPoint
desc: A point on a two-dimensional map projection.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a map point at an unspecified point.

items.name: init(x: Double, y: Double)
items.desc: Creates a new MKMapPoint structure from the specified values.

items.name: init(CLLocationCoordinate2D)
items.desc: Returns the map point data structure that corresponds to the specified coordinate.

items.name: var x: Double
items.desc: The location of the point along the x-axis of the map.

items.name: var y: Double
items.desc: The location of the point along the y-axis of the map.

items.name: var coordinate: CLLocationCoordinate2D
items.desc: Returns the latitude and longitude that corresponds to the specified map point.

items.name: func MKMapPointEqualToPoint(MKMapPoint, MKMapPoint) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the two map points are equal.

items.name: func distance(to: MKMapPoint) -> CLLocationDistance
items.desc: Returns the number of meters between two map points.

items.name: func MKMetersPerMapPointAtLatitude(CLLocationDegrees) -> CLLocationDistance
items.desc: Returns the distance spanned by one map point at the specified latitude.

items.name: func MKMapPointsPerMeterAtLatitude(CLLocationDegrees) -> Double
items.desc: Returns the number of map points that represent one meter at the given latitude.

items.name: func MKStringFromMapPoint(MKMapPoint) -> String
items.desc: Returns a formatted string for the specified map point.
